Articles.Content:
I was watching some old Bob Fitch odyssey videos and would like to know some of the mods he uses (and before you say "he has a list of mods look there" I have and they're not there)

This upper stage fuel tank [in red area] from episode 6 (

25:50)

And the cylindrical truss [just the main big round part not the things attached] from episode 9 (

25:35)

If anyone could let me know what mods these parts are from I would be greatly appreciative)

Thank you

Edited February 4, 2015 by alien123

Most of the tanks look like Near Future http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-21-Near-Future-Propulsion-Pack the white ones attached to the middle look like the rcs tanks for KOSMOS http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99168-KOSMOS-4-0-25-Coming-Soon?p=1522548#post1522548 solar panels are from one of those 2 also, I don't know where he is getting that round frame from and some of the parts are just re-textured and welded parts so in away he is making up parts from alot of mods.

EDIT- and from the link there is a link to GitHub http://goo.gl/K3PNkt there you can see all the mods, Looks like if you wanted you could download his whole GameData folder.

Edited February 1, 2015 by Mecripp2
thanks for your help, do you have any idea where the fuel tank in the red is from as I really want to find that mod?

I by look at his GitHub would say it's just a re-textured KW tank but it's hard to tell he has a-lot of parts named transfer stage.

EDIT- Here is the link on GitHub on that part https://github.com/Felbourn/Odyssey/blob/master/saves/Odyssey/Subassemblies/2.5m%20Centaur%20III.craft

Edited February 1, 2015 by Mecripp2
Ok thanks I will have a look at some retexture mods

thank you very much you dont know how long I have bee looking for that tank. From the horses mouth

could you tell be were the truss cam from as well please?
The truss section looks like it might be the truss from this mod
Yeah it looks that way but its not, I can make it look the same by using to but the game does not like parts being inside each other

The white-tanks (red-area) in the first image are from LLL: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102237-0-90-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-%28Space-boxes!%29-LLL-13-1-13DE2014

The truss parts in the second image are from SXT: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-SXT-19-07DEC14-KSC-v3

The 2.5m version is disabled by default, so only the 3.75m will show up. But I can whip up a MM config to re-enable the 2.5m version (I think that's the size in the image).

---

Edit:

Adding these lines:

@PART[SXTMTVGirder|SXTMTVGirderBasic|SXTMTVGirderOpen|SXTMTVGirderOpenSmall]
{
%TechRequired = advMetalworks
%entryCost = 7800
@category = Propulsion
)

to GameData/SXT/Partdisabler.cfg or just any of the .cfg in the SXT folder should re-enable them.

---

Hope that helps.

Edited February 4, 2015 by Lack

Oh my god thank you so much man, Bob and Lack on my lowely thread!!!

Man you guys are some of the best ksp content creates around thankyou so much
